attributes.action: STOP NEEDLE REHABILITATION CENTRE BEING PLACED IN CANNOCK TOWN CENTRE
attributes.background:
Drug addicts in Cannock and the surrounding towns could soon exchange their needles at the old Post Office building on Church Street.
 
RESIDENTS OF CANNOCK DONT WANT THIS CENTRE IN OUR TOWN CENTRE WHERE WE SHOP WITH OUR CHILDREN.
WE ARE ALL FOR HELPING ADDICTS BUT NOT WHERE WE SHOP.

rejection.details:
Planning matters are not the responsibility of Parliament and Government. They are the responsibility of your local authority.
More information about planning applications in your local authority and how to voice your opinion is available here: : https://www.cannockchasedc.gov.uk/residents/planning-building/development-control/view-planning-applications-and-make-comments
